page.title: 10Mrs Franklin - Secretary.
page.content: {Mrs. Franklin}has lived in{Fordham for 16 years. She has been the{school {secretary}for 3 years. Before becoming the school secretary she had a part time job at{Cambridge}as a {receptionist. Mrs. Franklin}cannot take shorthand, and she does not know how fast she can type. However{Mrs. {Franklin}is not just a{secretary,}she also helps in class and does odd jobs for the teachers. In her spare time {Mrs. Franklin}runs the{Congregational {Sunday School}which she has done for 4 years. She has also started a{youth {club}for the children. Her{hobies}are {gardening}and going out with her family. She finds time to go on holiday in the{School holidays.
